definition: a block of wood used to prevent the sliding or rolling of a heavy object, squeeze like a wedge into a tight space
details:
noun
- a block of wood used to prevent the sliding or rolling of a heavy object
= synonyms: chock
- something solid that is usable as an inclined plane (shaped like a V) that can be pushed between two things to separate them
- (golf) an iron with considerable loft and a broad sole
- a heel that is an extension of the sole of the shoe
= synonyms: wedge heel
- a diacritical mark (an inverted circumflex) placed above certain letters (such as the letter c) to indicate pronunciation
= synonyms: hacek
- a large sandwich made of a long crusty roll split lengthwise and filled with meats and cheese (and tomato and onion and lettuce and condiments)
= synonyms: torpedo
- any shape that is triangular in cross section
= synonyms: wedge shape, cuneus
verb
- squeeze like a wedge into a tight space
= synonyms: force
- put, fix, force, or implant
= synonyms: deposit
